explanation.approach: Sum of digits^(num digits) equals number.

title: Check Strong Number

explanation.approach: Sum of factorials of each digit equals number.

title: Check Perfect Number

explanation.approach: Sum of proper divisors equals number.

title: Check Abundant Number

explanation.approach: Sum of proper divisors exceeds number.

title: Check Deficient Number

explanation.approach: Sum of proper divisors less than number.

title: Check Harshad Number

explanation.approach: Number divisible by its digit sum.

title: Check Automorphic

explanation.approach: Square of number ends with the number.

explanation.approach: Count primes until we reach nth.
